item.title: Jason add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Jason add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Jason add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jason add a quote by Murray Gell-Mann
item.description: "Today the network of relationships linking the human race to itself and to the rest of the biosphere is so complex that all aspects affect all others to an extraordinary degree. Someone should be studying the whole system, however crudely that has to be done, because no gluing together of partial studies of a complex nonlinear system can give a good idea of the behavior of the whole. " -- Murray Gell-Mann
